actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A joint resolution relative to governmental control of any medium of mass communication.

summary.text: Declares that the Congress of the United States opposes attempts by governmental units at all levels to own, manage, or control any medium of mass communications, whether it be newspapers, broadcast stations, or cable television systems. Excepts noncommercial, educational broadcast stations, as defined in the Communications Act, from Congressional opposition to governmental control.

titles.title: A joint resolution relative to governmental control of any medium of mass communication.
